ne16:1.3: Yatha ayasma ajito parayane bhagavantam panham pucchati—
ne16:4.1: “Kenassu nivuto loko”ti panhe “avijjaya nivuto loko”ti bhagava padam sodheti, no ca arambham.
ne16:4.2: “Kenassu nappakasati”ti panhe “viviccha pamada nappakasati”ti bhagava padam sodheti, no ca arambham.
ne16:4.3: “Kissabhilepanam brusi”ti panhe “jappabhilepanam brumi”ti bhagava padam sodheti, no ca arambham.
ne16:4.4: “Kimsu tassa mahabbhayan”ti panhe “dukkhamassa mahabbhayan”ti suddho arambho.
ne16:7.1: “Savanti sabbadhi sota, sotanam kim nivaranan”ti panhe “yani sotani lokasmim, sati tesam nivaranan”ti bhagava padam sodheti, no ca arambham.
ne16:7.2: “Sotanam samvaram bruhi, kena sota pidhiyare”ti panhe “sotanam samvaram brumi, pannayete pidhiyare”ti suddho arambho.
ne16:11.3: Yattha evam suddho arambho, so panho visajjito bhavati.
ne16:11.4: Yattha pana arambho asuddho, na tava so panho visajjito bhavati.
